title: Never Look Away | Good Omens Animatic
author: foxssie
comment:
Crowley leaning in during the wing cover. Adorable, also them stargazing together is adorable. I really like the ‘look away’ comp with the Eras and their ‘looks’ throughout the present- also  ScOtTisH whIsKeY 
Very well done <3
Ok but I always get so excited when people use Vienna's music bc she's so under-appreciated. Gorgeous animatic you did SUCH a lovely job
Crowley making the Pikachu face is a masterpiece
i love all of the perfectly timed "look away" montage bits over time!!
That was so sweet and well done! The parallels between they both as angels and later on, they together as angel and demon, is just so perfect! They were so cuuute! I loved it omg
description:
Started making it, had a breakdown and the rest is history.

It was supposed to have some sort of story but it got lost on its way. Interpret this anyhow you like!
Also sorry about the typo in the end credits - chacters instead of characters :')) I was tired, ok?

(Yeah and I'm aware my style is constantly changing during the whole video :') )





Programs used: Paint Tool SAI and Windows Movie Maker

Characters: Good Omens by Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
Music: Never Look Away by Vienna Teng
